original_text: But if he says to you, ‘I will not go out from you,’ because he loves you and your household, since he is well-off with you,
korean_text: 종이 만일 너와 네 집을 사랑하므로 너와 동거하기를 좋게 여겨 네게 향하여 내가 주인을 떠나지 아니하겠노라 하거든

sentences.original_text: But if he says to you,
‘I will not go out from you,’
because he loves you and your household,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 너와 네 집을 사랑하기 때문이요,

sentences.original_text: since he is well-off with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 함께 있을 때 잘 지내기 때문이라.
